channel.title: flutter on Machine Code Never Lies

item.title: Sink
item.description: What Sink is a personal finance tracker that helps to track your expenses. It can be used to get a better overview of what exactly the money is being spent on. On the other hand, it’s still in (slow) development and not it is not available in either of the app stores, so you’ll probably want something else for now. Why I began coding it to get a grip on Flutter, at the time a new and shiny tool that was flying mostly under the radar.
